TEI.2.document_title: Thomas M Duke to Ramon Musquiz, 05-02-1828

barker_notes.barker_summary: Thomas M. Duke to Ramon Musquiz, May 2, 1828. Will correct the form of memorial concerning labor contracts. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 34

*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe,*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="05-02-1828">May 2 1828.*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*See Calendar.*/p*
